name: Abnormal world: season one
description: In this big abnormal world, there is not enough food. Your task is to feed the inhabitants of this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,10 Processor: core 2 duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia gt 9600 (or equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: High Definition Audio
